verses.verse: אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭תְהַלֵּל <WH1984> Boast בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> not what a day מָחָ֑ר <WH4279> not thyself of to morrow כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵ֝דַ֗ע <WH3045> for thou knowest מַה־ <WH4100> what יֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> may bring forth יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> A day

יְהַלֶּלְךָ֣ <WH1984> praise זָ֣ר <WH2114> Let another man וְלֹא־ <WH3808> your own פִ֑יךָ <WH6310> thee and not thine own mouth נָ֝כְרִ֗י <WH5237> a stranger וְאַל־ <WH408> and not שְׂפָתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8193> and not thine own lips

כֹּֽבֶד־ <WH3514> [is] heavy אֶ֭בֶן <WH68> A stone וְנֵ֣טֶל <WH5192> weighty הַח֑וֹל <WH2344> and the sand וְכַ֥עַס <WH3708> wrath אֱ֝וִ֗יל <WH191> but a fool's כָּבֵ֥ד <WH3515> [is] heavier מִשְּׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> than them both

אַכְזְרִיּ֣וּת <WH395> [is] cruel חֵ֭מָה <WH2534> Wrath וְשֶׁ֣טֶף <WH7858> [is] outrageous אָ֑ף <WH639> and anger וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who יַ֝עֲמֹד <WH5975> but who [is] able to stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before קִנְאָֽה׃ <WH7068> envy
ט֭וֹבָה <WH2896> [is] better תּוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> rebuke מְגֻלָּ֑ה <WH1540> Open מֵֽאַהֲבָ֥ה <WH160> love מְסֻתָּֽרֶת׃ <WH5641> than secret

נֶ֭אֱמָנִים <WH539> Faithful פִּצְעֵ֣י <WH6482> [are] the wounds אוֹהֵ֑ב <WH157> of a friend וְ֝נַעְתָּר֗וֹת <WH6280> [are] deceitful נְשִׁיק֥וֹת <WH5390> but the kisses שׂוֹנֵֽא׃ <WH8130> of an enemy

נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul שְׂ֭בֵעָה <WH7649> The full תָּב֣וּס <WH947> loatheth נֹ֑פֶת <WH5317> an honeycomb וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul רְ֝עֵבָ֗ה <WH7457> but to the hungry כָּל־ <WH3605> any מַ֥ר <WH4751> every bitter thing מָתֽוֹק׃ <WH4966> is sweet

כְּ֭צִפּוֹר <WH6833> As a bird נוֹדֶ֣דֶת <WH5074> that wandereth מִן־ <WH4480> from קִנָּ֑הּ <WH7064> from her nest כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> So אִ֝֗ישׁ <WH376> so [is] a man נוֹדֵ֥ד <WH5074> that wandereth מִמְּקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> from his place

שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> Ointment וּ֭קְטֹרֶת <WH7004> and perfume יְשַׂמַּֽח־ <WH8055> rejoice לֵ֑ב <WH3820> the heart וּמֶ֥תֶק <WH4986> so [doth] the sweetness רֵ֝עֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> of a man's friend מֵֽעֲצַת־ <WH6098> counsel נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> by hearty

רֵֽעֲךָ֨ <WH7453> Thine own friend [וְרֵעֶה כ] (וְרֵ֪עַ <WH7463> friend ק) אָבִ֡יךָ <WH1> and thy father's אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲזֹ֗ב <WH5800> forsake וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house אָחִ֗יךָ <WH251> into thy brother's אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֭בוֹא <WH935> not neither go בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day אֵידֶ֑ךָ <WH343> of thy calamity ט֥וֹב <WH2896> [for] better שָׁכֵ֥ן <WH7934> [is] a neighbour קָ֝ר֗וֹב <WH7138> [that is] near מֵאָ֥ח <WH251> than a brother רָחֽוֹק׃ <WH7350> far off
חֲכַ֣ם <WH2449> be wise בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son וְשַׂמַּ֣ח <WH8056> glad לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> and make my heart וְאָשִׁ֖יבָה <WH7725> break חֹרְפִ֣י <WH2778> him that reproacheth דָבָֽר׃ <WH1697> act

עָר֤וּם <WH6175> A prudent רָאָ֣ה <WH7200> [man] foreseeth רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> the evil נִסְתָּ֑ר <WH5641> [and] hideth פְּ֝תָאיִ֗ם <WH6612> himself [but] the simple עָבְר֥וּ <WH5674> pass on נֶעֱנָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH6064> [and] are punished

קַח־ <WH3947> Take בִּ֭גְדוֹ <WH899> his garment כִּי־ <WH3588> when עָ֣רַב <WH6148> that is surety זָ֑ר <WH2114> for a stranger וּבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> and for נָכְרִיָּ֣ה <WH5237> of him for a strange woman חַבְלֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2254> and take a pledge

מְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> He that blesseth רֵעֵ֨הוּ ׀ <WH7453> his friend בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּ֭דוֹל <WH1419> with a loud בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> in the morning הַשְׁכֵּ֑ים <WH7925> rising early קְ֝לָלָ֗ה <WH7045> a curse תֵּחָ֥שֶׁב <WH2803> it shall be counted לֽוֹ׃

דֶּ֣לֶף <WH1812> dropping ט֭וֹרֵד <WH2956> A continual בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day סַגְרִ֑יר <WH5464> in a very rainy וְאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> woman [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <WH4066> brawling ק) נִשְׁתָּוָֽה׃ <WH7737> are alike
צֹפְנֶ֥יהָ <WH6845> Whosoever hideth צָֽפַן־ <WH6845> her hideth ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> the wind וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> and the ointment יְמִינ֣וֹ <WH3225> of his right hand יִקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> [which] bewrayeth
בַּרְזֶ֣ל <WH1270> Iron בְּבַרְזֶ֣ל <WH1270> iron יָ֑חַד <WH2300> sharpeneth וְ֝אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> so a man יַ֣חַד <WH2300> sharpeneth פְּנֵֽי־ <WH6440> the countenance רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> of his friend

נֹצֵ֣ר <WH5341> Whoso keepeth תְּ֭אֵנָה <WH8384> the fig tree יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> shall eat פִּרְיָ֑הּ <WH6529> the fruit וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> thereof so he that waiteth אֲדֹנָ֣יו <WH113> on his master יְכֻבָּֽד׃ <WH3513> shall be honoured
כַּ֭מַּיִם <WH4325> As in water הַפָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> face לַפָּנִ֑ים <WH6440> [answereth] to face כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> So לֵֽב־ <WH3820> so the heart הָ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man לָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> to man

שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> Hell [וַאֲבַדֹּה כ] (וַ֭אֲבַדֹּו <WH10> destruction ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> are never תִשְׂבַּ֑עְנָה <WH7646> full וְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> so the eyes הָ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תִשְׂבַּֽעְנָה׃ <WH7646> are never satisfied

מַצְרֵ֣ף <WH4715> [As] the fining pot לַ֭כֶּסֶף <WH3701> for silver וְכ֣וּר <WH3564> and the furnace לַזָּהָ֑ב <WH2091> for gold וְ֝אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> so [is] a man לְפִ֣י <WH6310> to מַהֲלָלֽוֹ׃ <WH4110> his praise

אִ֥ם <WH518> Though תִּכְתּֽוֹשׁ־ <WH3806> Though thou shouldest bray אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱוִ֨יל ׀ <WH191> a fool בַּֽמַּכְתֵּ֡שׁ <WH4388> in a mortar בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among הָ֭רִיפוֹת <WH7383> wheat בַּֽעֱלִ֑י <WH5940> with a pestle לֹא־ <WH3808> will not תָס֥וּר <WH5493> depart מֵ֝עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and אִוַּלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH200> [yet] will not his foolishness פ

יָדֹ֣עַ <WH3045> Be thou diligent תֵּ֭דַע <WH3045> to know פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the state צֹאנֶ֑ךָ <WH6629> of thy flocks שִׁ֥ית <WH7896> [and] look לִ֝בְּךָ֗ <WH3820> well לַעֲדָרִֽים׃ <WH5739> to thy herds

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [are] not for ever חֹ֑סֶן <WH2633> For riches וְאִם־ <WH518> Nor נֵ֝֗זֶר <WH5145> and doth the crown לְד֣וֹר <WH1755> [endure] to every [דֹור כ] (וָדֹֽור׃ <WH1755> all ק)

גָּלָ֣ה <WH1540> appeareth חָ֭צִיר <WH2682> The hay וְנִרְאָה־ <WH7200> sheweth דֶ֑שֶׁא <WH1877> and the tender grass וְ֝נֶאֶסְפ֗וּ <WH622> are gathered עִשְּׂב֥וֹת <WH6212> itself and herbs הָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> of the mountains
כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> The lambs לִלְבוּשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH3830> [are] for thy clothing וּמְחִ֥יר <WH4242> [are] the price שָׂ֝דֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field עַתּוּדִֽים׃ <WH6260> and the goats

וְדֵ֤י ׀ <WH1767> enough חֲלֵ֬ב <WH2461> milk עִזִּ֗ים <WH5795> And [thou shalt have] goats' לְֽ֭לַחְמְךָ <WH3899> for thy food לְלֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> for the food בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> of thy household וְ֝חַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> and [for] the maintenance לְנַעֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5291> for thy maidens
